item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. macOS menu bar app that shows how full the ISS urine tank is in real time (526 points | 132 comments)
2. T * sin (t)' ≈ Ornamented Christmas Tree (2013) (106 points | 7 comments)
3. Merry Christmas Everyone (174 points | 49 comments)
4. Trying out QvQ – Qwen's new visual reasoning model (124 points | 31 comments)

7. Masks, Smoke, and Mirrors: The story of EgyptAir flight 804 (135 points | 60 comments)
8. Exploring LoRA – Part 1: The Idea Behind Parameter Efficient Fine-Tuning (28 points | 2 comments)
9. Will that hub or dock slow your SSDs, or even make them faster? (43 points | 21 comments)
10. Shockley Semiconductor Laboratory (68 points | 25 comments)

13. The number pi has an evil twin (470 points | 186 comments)
14. Earth's subsurface may hold up to 5.6 × 10⁶ million metric tons of hydrogen (19 points | 17 comments)
15. Gordon Mah Ung has died (84 points | 13 comments)
16. What happened to the world's largest tube TV? [video] (627 points | 273 comments)
17. A pilot raced through the airport to surprise the woman who saved his life (6 points | discuss)
18. Hoarder: Self-hostable bookmark-everything app (291 points | 58 comments)
19. What would it take to add refinement types to Rust? (97 points | 52 comments)
20. Are Immutable Linux Distros right for you? (20 points | 4 comments)
21. Jujutsu Megamerges and jj Absorb (21 points | 7 comments)
22. A Practitioner's Guide to Wide Events (45 points | 24 comments)
23. Cerebrum: Simulate and infer synaptic connectivity in large-scale brain networks (83 points | 63 comments)
24. On the nature of computing science (1984) (218 points | 87 comments)
25. Making AMD GPUs competitive for LLM inference (2023) (278 points | 179 comments)
26. Why are cancer guidelines stuck in PDFs? (269 points | 132 comments)
27. Build a Low-Cost Drone Using ESP32 (367 points | 126 comments)
28. Minutes of a Meeting Held at Gear Ratio on Tuesday 13 June 78 [pdf] (16 points | 5 comments)
29. I sensed anxiety and frustration at NeurIPS 24 (164 points | 106 comments)
30. Brazilian velvet ant is ultrablack (30 points | 20 comments)
